channel.title: Max Design articles
channel.description: A list of HTML, CSS and accessibility articles

item.title: A simple, styled checkbox
item.description: A simple method for styling checkboxes without resorting to non-native solutions

item.title: Chat GPT's accessible dropdown
item.description: How good is Chat GPT's accessible dropdown suggestion?

item.title: Methods of applying accessible descriptions to elements
item.description: This article explores a range of different methods that can be used to generate an accessible descriptions for elements.

item.title: Methods of applying accessible names to elements
item.description: This article explores a range of different methods that can be used to generate an accessible names for elements.

item.title: All 22 input types
item.description: Can you list all of the 22 different input types without having to resort to using Google?

item.title: The shape-shifting "a" element
item.description: A look at the strange and wonderful A element and which elements are allowed as child or descendant elements

item.title: The label element
item.description: A deep dive into the label element, including which elements need labelling, explicit vs implicit labelling and more

item.title: Concatenated accessible names
item.description: Did you know that the button element's content, and the content of its decendants may be concatenated to create an accessible name

item.title: The hidden and aria-hidden attributes
item.description: Do you know the difference between the hidden and aria-hidden attributes?
